data.message: Where will the drive be, and will they take walk-ins?

message:
Hey Cru! My house (Evans Scholars) is having a blood drive this Saturday from 11-4. Giving blood is an awesome way to help out people in need. Here are some facts about blood:

Every two seconds in the U.S. someone needs blood

About 7,000 units of platelets and 10,000 units of plasma are needed daily in the U.S.

A single car accident victim may need as many as 100 pints of blood, with the average transfusion being about 3 pints.

There is a huge need for blood every year, and it is the season of giving, so if you are interested in donating, please DM me or comment below so I can give you more details! Take care!
